name: MODERNIZE THE TRUCK FLEET (INFORMAL COALITION)
description: Informal Coalition to address the Federal Excise Tax (FET) on new truck and trailers.
sampleDescriptions: Informal Coalition effort is to educate policy-makers in an effort to repeal/replace the 12% Federal Excise Tax (FET) levied on the sale of new heavy-duty trucks and trailers.
Informal Coalition effort is to educate policy-makers in an effort to repeal/replace the 12% Federal Excise Tax (FET) levied on the sale of new heavy-duty trucks and trailers.
Informal Coalition effort is to educate policy-makers in an effort to repeal/replace the 12% Federal Excise Tax (FET) levied on the sale of new heavy-duty trucks and trailers.
Informal coalition organized to address (repeal/replace) the 12% Federal Excise Tax on the purchase of new trucks and trailers.
Effort to address (repeal/replace) the 12% Federal Excise Tax on the purchase of new trucks and trailers.
